summary: In 1942, in Bavaria, Eva Braun is alone, when Adolf Hitler arrives with Dr. Josef Goebbels and his wife Magda Goebbels and Martin Bormann to spend a couple of days without talking politics.
cast: Elena Rufanova|Eva Mattes|Leonid Mozgovoy|Peter Fitz|Irina Sokolova|Gerd Wameling|Yelena Spiridonova|Maud Ackermann|Vladimir Bogdanov|Udo Kroschwald|Anatoliy Shvederskiy|Friedrich W. Bauschulte|Franco Moscon|Natalya Nikulenko|Rosina Tsidulko
keywords: german|reference to adolf hitler|world war two
title: Molokh
